Colorful Lightbox Gallery

20 February 2019 on CSS, Animation, Responsive, JQuery

I set out to create a responsive lightbox image browser using only SASS.

Unfortunately for then I got lazy and added some JQuery for some more interactive flair.

I'd like to take another stab at this and see if there are some creative ways to implement the same sort of scroll/progress bar technique without the use of Javascript.

Matthew Hendricks
